name: Board Game
description: Project for IB Comp Sci IA 2018-2019: Computer Version of the board game Kingdoms and Knights. This program allows players to play the board game Kingdoms and Knights on the computer. Kingdoms and Knights is a strategy board game created by: Zach Greenberg, Jackson Elder, and Hayden Soelberg

name: Maze Solver
description: This is a program that finds the exit(s) to mazes.

name: Calendar
description: A program that allows you to add and keep track of single and reoccurring events.

name: Chess
description: A terminal chess game written in c++ using ASCII characters. Created By Zach Greenberg, Lucas Zagal, Pyae Sone.

name: Mph to Kmph Converter
description: An interactive application written in processing that converts Miles per hour to Kilometers per hour.

name: Computer Timeline
description: An interactive timeline of early digital computers written in processing.

name: Shape Calculator
description: A program written in c++ that calculates the volume and surface area of shapes.

name: Screensaver
description: An application that creates a cool design of lines for a screensaver.

name: Calculator
description: An interactive fully functioning calculator written in processing.
